dsDescriptionValue.value: In this special topic poll, respondents were asked how much  they knew about President Bill Clinton's investment in the Whitewater  real estate venture and whether they approved or disapproved of the  way Clinton was handling the Whitewater situation. Those queried were  asked whether Whitewater was a serious matter and whether their  opinion of Clinton had been affected by it. They were also asked to  speculate on both Bill and Hillary Clinton's roles in the Whitewater  venture and whether their actions were illegal. Demographic background variables include political orientation and sex.

topicClassValue.value: ICPSR XIV.C.1. Mass Political Behavior and Attitudes, Public Opinion on Political Matters, United States

distributorAffiliation.value: Institute for Social Research, University of Michigan

value: Adults aged 18 and over living in households with telephones.

fields.value: Households were selected by random-digit dialing. Within  households, the respondent selected was the adult living in the  household who last had a birthday and who was at home at the time of interview.
